column2: :  ඒ  කුණු පැත්ජෙන් එන හූ  ඩ එක්ක ඔබ වේ පැත්ජෙන් ජවඩි  ඩවල් තුනක් පිටජවලා

column1: On  behalf  of  the  aggrieved  party  the  contention  was  that  the  learned  High  Court  Judge  has
correctly considered that the prosecution has proved beyond reasonable doubt that there was an
unlawful assembly and the accused-appellants were members of the said unlawful assembly.
Further it was argued that PW 1's and PW 3's evidence are corroborated by the evidence of PW 5,
who has testified as follows vide page 1417 of volume II of the appeal brief;
